WorkItem.ClosedComment: This should work with the latest check in. Set SMP computation limit to about 1500 to get solution.
WorkItem.Description: I checked the new build with an xml of a fellow mage. With Brutallus fight parameters, the reconstruction shows a score of around 55. I can provide a WWS of the actual fight if you'd like to compare :)

Comments.Message: This is taking a while. It'll probably take a complete upgrade of the lp solver for this one to compute in reasonable time. I'm about 2/3 through the upgrade, but it probably won't be ready for b15.

Just an update on the progress. The solver upgrade is mainly complete and it's finally able to solve the problem in under a minute. Still quite a big number, but this partical problem is the hardest I've seen so far. It needs the SMP computation limit to be set a bit over 1000 to solve it. As a comparison most other problems even with pot/gem/flamecap constraints are solved in about 1-2 seconds. I'll work a bit more on this to see if I can squeeze any more performance out of it and if I'm satisfied with the results I might check it in for the b15 release.
